commit message: First real attempt to fix the S5 crash.

Bugfix: Don't create multiple instances of tag info tool.

Do not create a new instance of the tag info tool activity
earch time a non Mifare Classic tag is detected.
Bugfix: Don't close the key mapper if no key was found.

Removed unused code.

This code was added to prevent MCT from crashing on a S5. Now that
the crash issure is fixed (workaround) the code is no longer needed.

Motorola Moto X is supported.

Although http://www.andytags.com/nfc-tags-compatibility-issues.html
claims that Moto X does not support Mifare Classic, it does!
I has an NXP NFC controller!
(https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Motorola+Moto+X+Teardown/16867#s51669)
Thanks to Markus J. for reporting this.

Added warning notice about the two types of speical tags.

Fixed typo.

Added a hint for more info to the wirtemanuf. block option.

Fixed typos (replace ' with ').

New release: 1.7.5

Updated changelog.
Increased version number.
